moves.1... e5: most aggressive defence against bird (according to my experience me) , most often plaid by hight elo players
moves.2. fxe5: the best solution in my opinion, but then the situation is not comfortable for white. This is the risk with e4 ...
moves.2... d6: what you should not play is exd6 ! then he take back with the dsb and the way for a killer attack with the queen on h5 is done ...
moves.3. Nf3: this is the best answer, but the situation is still very uncomfortable ..
moves.4... Nc6 5. Be2: the e5 pawn is anyway sacrificed
moves.5... Bxf3 6. Bxf3: now an attack on h5 could be refuted
moves.6... Qh4+ 7. g3: that ' s all, no more danger. this attack is too early and give me a chance to castle (even if the castle is now weak
moves.7... Qd8: ouf ! i have a free tempo
moves.8. O-O Nxe5 9. c3: knight take lsb, i retake with the rook and place my queen on b3 threatening mate on f7...
moves.9... Nf6 10. d4: forcing the exchange even if my plans are are no longer current
moves.10... Nxf3+ 11. Rxf3 Be7 12. Bg5: if knight x e4, my dsb x e7 threatening the black queen, then i place my rook in e3 and intent to win the back knight
moves.12... Nxe4 13. Bxe7 Qxe7 14. Re3: that was the plan, but you know, this is a 3mn blitz, so i had to think quickly and i'm not sure about the suitability of it
moves.14... d5: that was expected, i will play Nd2
moves.15. Nd2 O-O: so the result of my plan is that i'm 1 pawn less, and a very weak situation in king side. great ! at this moment i'm not expecting any victory ...
moves.18. Rf1 Rae8: i will intent my last plan's chance : attacking black castle placing my rook in h4, but i don't believe it will win ..
moves.19. Rf4 Kh8 20. Rh4: i didnt saw the dangerous advancing g pawn ...
moves.21. Qg2 g5: surprise ! am i going to loose my rook ? not !
moves.22. Rh3: that's all. if g pawn advance, i go back to h4 and there is no thing more to kill my rook apart another rook, what would be just an exchange.
moves.22... Rfg8 23. Qe2: in case of f pawn advance
moves.24. Rxe4 f3 25. Qe3: so dangerous pawn, most of the time i loose with good player is a question of pawns !
moves.25... Rxe4 26. Qxe4: i have a secret weapon for what follows...
moves.27... Re8: so this is the black plan ! Ans i had found the emergency exit : Rxh7!
moves.28. Rxh7+: here we are, that was the wining white move. so what would you play there if you where blacks ?
moves.28... Kg8 29. Rxf7 Rxe4 30. Rxc7: and i win at least 2 pawns. then the situation will be clearly in my advantage, see it ....
moves.31... Ra1 32. Rxb7 Rxa2: so now i'm +3 and my king can come into the fight easily while black king is blocked on 8th line. so black resign.

gameName: another up 1700 elos in the bird's fish nets !
